name: ITAM
short_description: ITAM operates a platform (NFT.Farm) that values digital assets and freely trades such assets using ITAM NFT. ITAM NFT is a Middleware technology for cultural and artistic creations such as paintings, comics, fashion, and games.
description: ITAM operates a platform (NFT.Farm) that values digital assets and freely trades such assets using ITAM NFT. ITAM NFT is a Middleware technology for cultural and artistic creations such as paintings, comics, fashion, and games. We also collaborate with foreign cryptocurrency business partners to make ITAM's unique NFT creations available on DeFi platforms.
